COL.MC.summary: Colonial is a Spanish listed REIT company (SOCIMI), leader in the European Prime office market with presence in the main business areas of Barcelona, Madrid and Paris with a prime office portfolio of more than one million of sqm of GLA and assets under management with a value of more than Â12bn.

YDES.MC.long_name: Desarrollos Ermita del Santo, SOCIMI, S.A.
YDES.MC.summary: Desarrollos Ermita Del Santo Socimi, S.A. owns the La Ermita Shopping Center in Madrid, Spain. The company is based in Madrid, Spain.
